properties.areaDesc: Rush, IN; Johnson, IN; Tipton, IN; Madison, IN; Morgan, IN; Henry, IN; Delaware, IN; Hamilton, IN; Hancock, IN; Shelby, IN; Marion, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:39AM EST until January 11 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a

* Flood Warning for...
Madison County in central Indiana...
Shelby County in central Indiana...
Hancock County in central Indiana...
Western Rush County in central Indiana...
Western Delaware County in east central Indiana...
Morgan County in central Indiana...
Johnson County in central Indiana...
Marion County in central Indiana...
Western Henry County in east central Indiana...
Eastern Hamilton County in central Indiana...
Southeastern Tipton County in central Indiana...

* Until 1130 AM EST.

* At 837 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated a band of heavy rain with
embedded thunder extending from near Anderson...to the eastern
Indy metro area to southern Johnson County moving east. This band
will produce a quick half inch to inch of rain and cause flooding.
Additional rainfall will continue across the area once this line
passes.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Indianapolis, Anderson, Shelbyville, Carmel, Fishers, Noblesville,
Greenwood, Lawrence, Plainfield, Franklin, Greenfield, Beech Grove,
Martinsville, Speedway, Mooresville, Elwood, Alexandria, Southport,
Westfield and New Whiteland.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.

A Flood Warning means that flooding is imminent or occurring. All
interested parties should take necessary precautions immediately.
